pull.title: Move recently introduced CTransAction::IsEquivalentTo to CWalletTx
pull.body:
CTransAction::IsEquivalentTo was introduced in #5881.
This functionality is only used in the wallet, and should never have been added to the primitive transaction type.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
Move recently introduced CTransAction::IsEquivalentTo to CWalletTx

CTransAction::IsEquivalentTo was introduced in #5881.
This functionality is only useful to the wallet, and should never have
been added to the primitive transaction type.

events.body: There is nothing wallet-specific about the method, and in fact it is needed in P2P code in #4570 (though the IsEquivalentTo implementation there is in need of update).
The only existing non-consensus module that is shared between wallet and main, and knows about transactions, is `validationinterface`.
